resources.string:
1) Shake the insoles;
 2) (Optional) Open MoticonApp, select "Record", choose the insoles, connect and zeroize them. Then disconnect.
 3) Select "Range extension", choose the insoles and wait for the first connection (shake the insoles).
 4) Open "AcquisitionApp v1", touch "Listen TCP".
 5) To stop the gait session, open MoticonApp and touch "Disconnect".
 6) Wait a few minutes and check the created files in "internalStorage/Documents".
It allows the app to communicate with the insoles and read call registry.
Sorry, MoveCare needs your permission to continue.
